description:
Spacious one bedroom garden apartment (entire ground floor) in our Bed Stuy brownstone with private entry. Newly renovated with some original details. Floors, appliances, windows, doors, and furniture all brand new. Queen bed, fireplace (non-working), stainless steel appliances, white oak floors, sleeper sofa. Heat and A/C included. Charming and hip Brooklyn neighborhood with cafes and restaurants nearby. A, C, and J trains a short walk away. Bushwick only a few blocks away.

outdoor space

My husband and I live upstairs. The entire bottom floor will be yours during your stay. We are available if you have questions or needs.

This Brooklyn neighborhood is filled with brownstones. Coffee shops and restaurants nearby. Manny's and Grandchamps just around the corner. Saraghina and Chez Oscar a couple blocks away.

Good neighborhood for walking. Also J train and A and C trains are a short walk away. Bus available at the end of the block.

Wifi. Cable TV includes all channels plus HBO and Showtime. Washer/dryer in apartment.
name: Beautiful Garden Apartment in Bed Stuy Brownstone
